query:
SELECT
                b.price,
                b.bidder                                    AS from,
                b.expires_at,
                (
                    SELECT a.block_time FROM activities a
                    WHERE a.nft_id = $1 AND a.tx_id = b.created_tx_id
                    LIMIT 1
                )                                           AS updated_at,
                b.status
            FROM bids b
            WHERE b.nft_id = $1
            ORDER by updated_at DESC
            LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
